page.title: 10DAY IN THE LIFE OF G.HUNTER
page.content: I woke up at 7.30 a.m. and read until about 9.00 a.m. For breakfast I had toast.Mum was reading the paper while dad was washing his hair upstairs.It was very quiet without my sister who was at camp with the Brownies. After breakfast my mum saw a Didcot Railway Museum advertisement in the paper.Mum and I checked where it was on the map then we set off.When we got there we bought tickets then went on the steam driven Blue Peter Train.After we had walked around I went train spotting.When the high speed train went past it blew all my papers around.It was starting to rain heavily so we went back to the car and had lunch.
